question: Which of the following has won the "Samudra Manthan - Caring Organisation of the Year" award, recently?
explanation: The Jawaharlal Nehru Port Trust has won the "Samudra Manthan - Caring Organisation of the Year" award. The award was organised by Bhandarkar Shipping, which is a leading publication of the maritime industry. From the total 14 categories of Samudra Manthan award, JNPT was the winner in the "Caring Organization of the Year" category. The Samudra Manthan Award is a significant initiative instituted with an objective to fuel healthy competition in the maritime sector.
